issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Another case replication shall use the config in with clause.
fields.summary: Function replication in cloud fail when download resource from AWS

comments.body: [~daijy] [~thejas]Â Is this a blocker for 3.0 release? Or can it be deferred to next release?
Yes, this needs to go into 3.0 release. Always get lost in ptest. Kicking off again.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
